net.net16.jeremiahlowe.bettercollections

Class Grid<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.net16.jeremiahlowe.bettercollections.Grid<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - T is the type for each cell of grid

    public class Grid<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Grid for holding values of a specified type
    Author:
    Jeremiah Lowe
